item.title: About Cactuss
item.description: Why ? because. How ? with hugo (static website builder) and the PaperMod theme. Inspiration ? notion is an amazing website which allows you to takes notes on pretty much anything, i used to takes notes on notion. Usefull links for this project Twemoji, all emojis on Cactuss are twemoji that i downloaded from favicon. Markdown doc, all you have to know about markdown. Github repo, here you can access all files from Cactuss.
